caption.title: Swell height data for the Santa Barbara Channel.
caption.p: ( a) Monthly anomaly in the maximum significant wave height (max H s) measured from an offshore buoy for the period 1980–2015 and ( b) Modelled mean daily values of max H s averaged across the nine study sites for the period 2001–2015. The anomalously warm years of 2014–2015 are shown in red. Black arrows in ( a) denote the 1982–83 and 1997–98 El Niños.
